meanings.definition: Immature white blood cells found in the bone marrow.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the myelocytes under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Myelocytes play a crucial role in the body's immune system.
meanings.sent3: The myelocytes in the bone marrow were having a party, celebrating their growth.
meanings.sent4: Like seeds growing into plants, myelocytes develop into mature white blood cells.
meanings.sent5: The myelocytes danced and multiplied, ready to fight off any infections.

meanings.definition: Cells that give rise to granulocytes.
meanings.sent1: The myelocytes are the precursors of granulocytes in the blood.
meanings.sent2: In the process of hematopoiesis, myelocytes differentiate into granulocytes.
meanings.sent3: The myelocytes were like the talented chefs preparing the granulocytes for action.
meanings.sent4: Just as seeds sprout into plants, myelocytes transform into granulocytes.
meanings.sent5: The myelocytes paved the way for the granulocytes to defend the body.
